name: Keith Hall
introduction: John Keith Hall (born 9 January 1929 and died 12 January 2017) was a British racing driver who participated in Formula Two and Formula Three. He raced in numerous non-championship Formula One races between 1953 and 1958. He was also entered into the 1958 Moroccan Grand Prix by Lotus as a Formula Two entry, but did not participate in the event. He later raced sports cars until retiring from racing in 1958.[1]
